content.title: Reading
content.description:
Hafez was an Iranian poet. He is famous all over the world. Hafez lived in the city Shiraz. The poets of Hafez has been translated into many different languages.
Hafez tomb is located in the city Shiraz. A memorial service for Hafez is held on the thirteenth of October.
